code: import React,{useState}from'react';import IngredientInput from'./IngredientInput';import RecipeList from'./RecipeList';import RecipeDetail from'./RecipeDetail';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[recipes,setRecipes]=useState([]);const[selectedRecipe,setSelectedRecipe]=useState(null);console.log("Selected Recipe:",selectedRecipe);const searchRecipes=async ingredient=>{const apiUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:3001';const response=await fetch("".concat(apiUrl,"/recipes/search?ingredients=").concat(ingredient));const data=await response.json();setRecipes(data);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Recipe Finder"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IngredientInput,{onSearch:searchRecipes}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"content-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RecipeList,{recipes:recipes,onSelectRecipe:setSelectedRecipe}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RecipeDetail,{recipe:selectedRecipe})]})]});}export default App;
